processedDockerfile:
FROM tomcat:8.5-jdk8
ENV GN_FILE="geonetwork.war"
ENV DATA_DIR="$CATALINA_HOME/webapps/geonetwork/WEB-INF/data"
ENV JAVA_OPTS="-Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom -Djava.awt.headless=true -server -Xms512m -Xmx2024m -XX:NewSize=512m -XX:MaxNewSize=1024m -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC"
# Environment variables
ENV GN_VERSION="3.12.9"
ENV GN_DOWNLOAD_MD5="cea7a8635cc73f31ea026f848216ae0e"
SHELL ["/bin/bash", "-o", "pipefail", "-c"]
WORKDIR $CATALINA_HOME/webapps
RUN apt-get update \
 && apt-get install --no-install-recommends unzip curl -y \
 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
 && curl -fSL -o $GN_FILE https://sourceforge.net/projects/geonetwork/files/GeoNetwork_opensource/v${GN_VERSION}/${GN_FILE}/download \
 && echo "${GN_DOWNLOAD_MD5} *${GN_FILE}" | md5sum -c \
 && mkdir -p geonetwork \
 && unzip -e $GN_FILE -d geonetwork \
 && rm $GN_FILE
# Set geonetwork data dir
COPY ./docker-entrypoint.sh /entrypoint.sh
#  Needed to make GN to create logs, jcs_caching and gn H2 database in the tomcat directory.
WORKDIR $CATALINA_HOME
ENTRYPOINT ["/entrypoint.sh"]
HEALTHCHECK CMD curl --fail http://127.0.0.1:8080 || exit 1
CMD ["catalina.sh", "run"]
ENV POSTGRES_PASSWORD="gi9o/iwPBMtTqArKWIZZIDcG1UoZvb1gUISjKmFZ" \
    AWS_ACCESS_KEY="A3TPDDRVY98W6PREE2TL"
originalDockerfile:
FROM tomcat:8.5-jdk8

ENV GN_FILE geonetwork.war
ENV DATA_DIR=$CATALINA_HOME/webapps/geonetwork/WEB-INF/data
ENV JAVA_OPTS="-Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom -Djava.awt.headless=true -server -Xms512m -Xmx2024m -XX:NewSize=512m -XX:MaxNewSize=1024m -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC"

#Environment variables
ENV GN_VERSION 3.12.9
ENV GN_DOWNLOAD_MD5 cea7a8635cc73f31ea026f848216ae0e
SHELL ["/bin/bash", "-o", "pipefail", "-c"]

WORKDIR $CATALINA_HOME/webapps

RUN apt-get update && \
     apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
          unzip=6.0-26ubuntu3.1 curl=7.81.0-1ubuntu1.10 &&\
     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && \
     curl -fSL -o $GN_FILE \
     https://sourceforge.net/projects/geonetwork/files/GeoNetwork_opensource/v${GN_VERSION}/${GN_FILE}/download && \
     echo "${GN_DOWNLOAD_MD5} *${GN_FILE}" | md5sum -c && \
     mkdir -p geonetwork && \
     unzip -e $GN_FILE -d geonetwork && \
     rm $GN_FILE

#Set geonetwork data dir
COPY ./docker-entrypoint.sh /entrypoint.sh

# Needed to make GN to create logs, jcs_caching and gn H2 database in the tomcat directory.
WORKDIR $CATALINA_HOME
ENTRYPOINT ["/entrypoint.sh"]

HEALTHCHECK CMD curl --fail http://127.0.0.1:8080 || exit 1

CMD ["catalina.sh", "run"]

 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
 && curl -fSL -o $GN_FILE https://sourceforge.net/projects/geonetwork/files/GeoNetwork_opensource/v${GN_VERSION}/${GN_FILE}/download \
 && echo "${GN_DOWNLOAD_MD5} *${GN_FILE}" | md5sum -c \
 && mkdir -p geonetwork \
